thread.title: China's Unisplendour to invest $3.78 billion in Western Digital (Reuters)
thread.title_full: China's Unisplendour to invest $3.78 billion in Western Digital (Reuters)

title: China's Unisplendour to invest $3.78 billion in Western Digital (Reuters)
text:
(Reuters) - U.S. data storage company Western Digital Corp said it would get a $3.78 billion equity investment from Chinese information technology company Unisplendour Corp Ltd. 
The company said on Wednesday it would issue new shares to Unisplendour at $92.50 each. 
The Chinese company will hold about 15 percent of Western Digital's issued and outstanding shares after the investment. 
(Reporting by Ankit Ajmera in Bengaluru; Editing by Kirti Pandey)
